ECA-USD.summary: Electra (ECA) is a cryptocurrency launched in 2017. Users are able to generate ECA through the process of mining. Electra has a current supply of 29,612,616,109.59136 with 0 in circulation. The last known price of Electra is 0.00005156 USD and is up 1.97 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 6 active market(s) with $1,137.55 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at http://electracore.weebly.com/.
